structure.unit: Massachusetts Low Level Radioactive Waste Management Act

law.catch_line: Phase Iii Of The Low Level Waste Management Act; Selection Of Operator And Technology
law.text: The selection of an operator and technology or technologies to be utilized at a facility to be developed at any superior site shall be, conducted in accordance with sections twenty-six to twenty-eight, inclusive, which shall be known and be cited as “Phase III of the Low-Level Waste Management Act”, and in accordance with the regulations adopted under section fifteen. The provision of said sections twenty-six to twenty-eight, inclusive, and regulations shall be implemented so as to permit any site community to select the operator and technology or technologies that best ensure proper facility operation in order to protect public health, safety and the environment.
